description: Interact with the Omi API to manage conversations and memories seamlessly. Retrieve, create, and manipulate user data effortlessly, enhancing your applications with rich conversational capabilities.

tools.name: read_omi_conversations
tools.description: Retrieves user conversations from Omi with pagination and filtering options

limit.description: Maximum number of conversations to return (max: 1000, default: 100)

offset.description: Number of conversations to skip for pagination (default: 0)

user_id.description: The user ID to fetch conversations for

statuses.description: Comma-separated list of statuses to filter conversations by

include_discarded.description: Whether to include discarded conversations (default: false)

tools.name: read_omi_memories
tools.description: Retrieves user memories from Omi with pagination options

limit.description: Maximum number of memories to return (max: 1000, default: 100)

offset.description: Number of memories to skip for pagination (default: 0)

user_id.description: The user ID to fetch memories for

tools.name: create_omi_conversation
tools.description: Creates a new Omi conversation with text content and metadata

text.description: The full text content of the conversation

user_id.description: The user ID to create the conversation for

language.description: Language code (e.g., "en" for English). Optional, defaults to "en".

started_at.description: When the conversation/event started in ISO 8601 format. Optional.

finished_at.description: When the conversation/event ended in ISO 8601 format. Optional.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate. Required when geolocation is provided.

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate. Required when geolocation is provided.

geolocation.description: Location data for the conversation. Optional object containing latitude and longitude.

text_source.description: Source of the text content. Required. Options: "audio_transcript", "message", "other_text".

text_source_spec.description: Additional specification about the source. Optional.

tools.name: create_omi_memories
tools.description: Creates Omi memories by extracting from text or using explicit memory objects

text.description: The text content from which memories will be extracted. Either this or memories must be provided.

user_id.description: The user ID to create memories for

content.description: The content of the memory. Required.

memories.description: An array of explicit memory objects to be created directly. Either this or text must be provided.

text_source.description: Source of the text content. Optional. Options: "email", "social_post", "other".

text_source_spec.description: Additional specification about the source. Optional.
